keywords: Let Apps Activate With Voice Above Lock
description: This policy setting specifies whether Windows apps can be activated by voice while the system is locked.
name: LetAppsActivateWithVoiceAboveLock
displayName: Let Apps Activate With Voice Above Lock

options.description: User in control. Users can decide if Windows apps can be activated by voice while the screen is locked using Settings > Privacy options on the device.
